website_summaries.verdict: Durable, bacteria-resistant, and stylishly designed, this cheese plate is sure to impress guests no matter what delicious treats you serve them.
pros: Features a pair of indented side trays
cons: A larger model would be a nice option to have

website_summaries.verdict: Half the price of other models, this bamboo cheese board is a delightful choice for displaying your meats, cheeses, fruits, or spreads.
pros: Features additional spaces for your crackers or bread
Side handles make it easy to serve.Durable, thick, and gentle to your knives
cons: A few have said the engravings contain misspelled words

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to make a charcuterie board for my book club, it was a big hit! I love the indents on the side. I love how it smells when I rinse it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kels K.

customer_reviews.title: You bettah recognize!
customer_reviews.text: Do you like to look fancy? Are you the type of person that holds your pinky out when you sip tea? Or maybe you just want people to think you do? Then buy this board, pick up some fancy cheeses, nuts, grapes and crackers and set it out when you have guests. They won’t disagreee with anything you say all evening because they will recognize you’re a person of impeccable taste and class.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gagel

customer_reviews.title: Meat and cheese platter
customer_reviews.text: I love this platter... It’s perfect for a date night or if you are having a little party. The only flaw is that it doesn’t come with utensils (cheese knife etc). I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size and it looks far more expensive than it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cheeseboard on a whim for a family event. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. It is the perfect size and it looks far more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better
customer_reviews.text: VERY successful purchase. First of all, it arrived in SUPER SPEEDY time, very securely packaged. Even without unwrapping it, I could tell from the start that it was a piece of quality (so hard to find, especially at this price). The bamboo is a very solid piece of wood, beautiful in color & function - I've rarely seen a cheeseboard that has specially designated sections for crackers which saves you from cluttering up your table with extra dishes. The size is perfect, large enough to serve several kinds of cheese without crowding. Can't wait to use it for upcoming holidays !!!
customer_reviews.author: BookBabe

customer_reviews.title: A gift happily received
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my daughter received the day of a party she was giving. She loved it and that me profusely, and she is very clear if she doesn’t like something. Loved where the crackers went, and how much it held.
customer_reviews.author: ArlySing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cheese board; used it on the boat yesterday. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vivica

customer_reviews.title: He is going to like it. It's the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I am very proud of this Christmas present for my father-in-law. It is classy looking and he prepares snacks (crackers, gouda cheese, radishes, avocado, sausage every night. He is going to like it. It's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Happy with New Kirby with Shampooer.

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining, but wish it was bigger!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this board has grooves to hold crackers, but I had to get 2 boards to effectively create a charcuterie board for a party. High quality material with a nice design. I just wish it was available in a bigger size so I only needed one of them!
customer_reviews.author: HmNggt

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great little cheese board for the price. Used it yesterday for a Christmas cheese platter. Just enough space for 3-4 types of cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: Im_an_OSUbeaverfan

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, but some misspelled words.
customer_reviews.text: The tray is a nice size, good price, but has some misspellings. I guess I didn’t look at the photos closely enough, but there are some misspelled words in the center design. Camambert (Camembert), Roquffort (Roquefort), Mozarella (Mozzarella), Cedar (Cheddar). I’m still going to keep it since the center will be covered with meat and cheeses. No one will ever notice!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charcuterie board! And eco friendly, sustainable materials!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful charcuterie boards. Purchased two and they are the perfect size and fit together perfectly end to end on EITHER side. I love this board. Cute design in the center, two indented sides for crackers or anything else you want to stabilize a little, perfect weight and a sustainable material. Win, win!!! Great price. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B E

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at damaged merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed. I needed this for Thanksgiving this year and now I don’t want to use it. It has a huge gouge in it in the wood, the box wasn’t damaged, the paper around it wasn’t damaged, it came this way. Obviously their quality control people are not looking at their products Very closely before shipping them. I was so excited to get this too.
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This came to my home defective . I’m still waiting for Royal Craft to respond to my issue. The cheese board has sharp nails protruding through the wood. When I ran my hand across it I didn’t see it at first. Cut my arm open on this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Print is not uniform, board is not smooth
customer_reviews.text: The print on the board vary in shades. Darker somewhere, very lighter somewhere. Doesn't look uniform. The surface of the board is not smooth, rough to touch. Expected a more presentable board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother in law. She hosts a lot of get togethers for the family and parties. She absolutely loves it and shows it off to everyone. Quality is great for the price, and it comes with all this nifty knives which are great for cheese btw. My only complaint is, it could be a tad bigger but I guess that’s because our family is big and we eat a lot of cheese :) Overall would recommend to anyone that hosts parties and get togethers
customer_reviews.author: Joan gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of good reviews on this product which made me feel comfortable buying this. Needless to say, I was disappointed when unboxing it. Surface and edges were rough to the touch with splintering in the grooves and there was a good chunk of wood missing from the tray. Item definitely needs to be sanded and inspected before being shipped out to customers
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Phan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a cheesebord for a long time. Wanted one with plenty of space and cracker holds. I also wanted a design or imprint. I have an engraved one and loved but did not want to use it. Found this one. Very nice. Smaller than what I wanted but it seems standard size. I returned the one I bought only because my mother in law surprised me and bought the exact one for me. She knew it had been in my cart for weeks as I searched around. Happy with my board. Love ya Mom!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drawer sticks and once closed, couldn't be opened again. Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I used this over the holidays, i thought it was awesome, but once it was wiped down (not submerged in water) the drawer became almost impossible to open once it was closed fulled. Had to pry it open with a screw driver, but then was afraid to close again for fear of it sticking again. It's a nice board and I really loved to graphics and layout, but the bad drawer design prompted me to have to return it. Maybe the manufacturer can adjust the fabrication process to allow more "play" in the drawer slide tabs.
customer_reviews.author: jmess5

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the wording on the board ... letters uneven and difficult to read. See attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: NancyG

customer_reviews.title: OK for infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: There are probably better units out there. Various types of cheese names are spelled incorrectly, almost comically incorrectly. While I probably shouldn't have put it in the dishwasher - I did - and things are coming apart now after one wash. The sizing overall isn't quite right.. the 'trays' could be bigger relative to the flat space. It does what it needs to and guests aren't going to comment on anything, but I'm confident there are better choices out there.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy, but image and wording not totally visible.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. One to keep, one as a gift. The images and the wording on one of the boards is barely visible on a portion of the center. Maybe it's supposed to be that way? Then I am worried if the brown image will come off onto the cheeses. Otherwise fantastic quality. Even has depression underneath for your fingers when carrying. I may not give the other as a gift because I can't be sure about the image and wording without opening it up. I may send one back and buy a different kind for gift giving. Haven't decided yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: We use this all the time and really like it
customer_reviews.text: This was affordable and is well-designed and sturdy. We use it a lot for graze boards. You can flip it over and use the back for a cutting board, too. I got a nice snail mail letter from the supplier after I had had it for a few weeks, letting me know that if there were ever problems, I could contact them - very classy. I'd recommend this great deal to anybody who wants a board for serving cheese, snacks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ldl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Handmade with Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love to entertain and this cheese board was a delightful addition to my collection. Beautiful, sturdy and functional! Just what I was expecting and more! Made in America, by a veteran and single father with love and pride in his work was a bonus as far as I’m concerned! Thank you Alex Arno for a piece that I will cherish and use for years to come! God Bless You and the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I did buy it for a gift, but now think I might have to reorder one for myself. It looks great and very well made. Well I did buy a second one and I love it. Very well made and looks beautiful. Great company and great customer service I was very surprised to receive a beautiful letter in the mail explaining who owns Royal Craft Wood. I have to say after reading the letter I will support this company and tell my friends about it. Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gleavy

customer_reviews.title: The cutest and has built in cheese knives!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cheeseboard and have used it multiple times since I bought it in November 2020. I loveee a good charcuterie board and this is the perfect size! The drawer sometimes gets stuck but worth it for the built in cheese knives!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Faded and non existent lettering
customer_reviews.text: Disppuinted that the writing was faded or non existent on parts of the board. Unfortunately I needed it for an event the same evening I received it or I would’ve returned it. It served its purpose for my entertaining but visually it is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Cozadd

customer_reviews.title: You haven't fixed the spelling error. I just got one!
customer_reviews.text: The names of the cheeses are spelled wrong (received on 12/3/18). I'm not gifting these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: ~ PERFECT GIFT FOR ANYONE ~
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wonderful cheese board for my best friend's birthday. My friends enjoys entertaining, so having a HIGH quality and FUNCTIONAL board is very important to her. My friend was REALLY impressed, so I know I scored BIG points with this purchase. Since her birthday, I received many photos of this cheese board with different food arrangements of cheese, crackers, olives, etc. If you are looking for a perfect high quality cheese board, for an affordable price, you should buy one from Royal Craft Wood. This cheese board will make a really nice and functional additional to all of your parties. AND, as an additional bonus, you will be supporting a veteran owned American family company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarka S

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased with my Charcuterie Platter & Serving Tray for Wine, Crackers, Brie and Meat. This platter/serving tray also has 2 sections for crackers. Not only was I impressed by my new cheese board, I was impressed by the the personal letter I received from this Made-In -America, family-owned business. Truly a beautiful & functional cheese board.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: THESE CHARCUTERIE BOARDS ARE WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these amazing boards, because my husband and I were having a covid-safe wine tasting event for my nephew and his fiance; this way each couple would share their own board. I must say, the boards made quite an impression! We received several compliments on how the boards were roomy enough for plenty of goodies; the quality of the design, its sturdiness, and what a stunning presentation they make! These Charcuterie Boards are easy to clean and would make lovely gifts! I am completely happy with this purchase, and if you are looking to purchase a charcuterie/cheese board, I highly recommend you go with these!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for book clubs!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to learn to make a charcuterie board as a pandemic activity since I’m stuck at home, and I really enjoyed this a lot! It gives me an excuse to put out all of the last olives and pickles in the jar and the last pieces of sandwich meat and cheese instead of them sitting there in the fridge and spoiling. It looks lovely too - perfect for book clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B. Readin

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but wording was smeared.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and it was very low quality. The ink printed on the board was smeared. I would not buy this again and ended up buying the DRAGONN 100% Natural Bamboo Cheese Board. It was much better.
customer_reviews.author: David Orr

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I am super disappointed on amazon for allowing wrong product reviews. The reviews have pictures and says the board comes with the knife sets . I saw the reviews and was exited even though the product description did not mention it . I received it and I see they don’t come with it . The board is heavy and feels sturdy but the edges are very sharp and could use some more sanding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It held a lot on this board. No utensils were included but for the price I can see it lasting a long time. Hand wash it! I loved that this is made by a family in America that takes pride in what they do. A hand signed letter came explaining the background of the product. I thought that was really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning cheese board that wears well. Handles are very convenient and sides are perfect for crackers, etc. Only complaint was that the design was very faint compaired to the online pics or some of the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Lilaea

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Royal Craft cheese and meat boards for Christmas gifts. I absolutely loved them so I kept one myself! The handles on the underside are very nice. The look and quality is excellent and you cannot beat the price. Best part is the boards are American made and family owned. I plan to buy the Xlarge board for myself to use along with this board and use them both as charcuterie serving boards.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: Its a very nice board. I bought it on a whim and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice board. I bought it on a whim and wished i had read the whole description because i assumed from the picture that it came with the 2 knives. But that was my mistake. Can't wait to gift it to my Godmother for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A total hit! It’s good quality and large enough to fulfill all of your charcuterie dreams. I can tell it’s definitely going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY board
customer_reviews.text: I love this charcuterie board! It is so nice and sturdy and the price point is amazing! The customer service is awesome, and this is a small business you’d be supporting if you purchased. If you’ve been thinking about it, it’s time for you to get this board. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Best charcuterie board
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a charcuterie board for get togethers this is the one. I had been looking for a while and found this one and it takes the cake. It has carved out spots for crackers or whatever you’d like to place, the size is great for a variety of snacks. The quality of the wood is fantastic as well you can tell it is not cheaply made like other boards. I will definitely continue to use this board when company is over. My friends loved having it out for our most recent Super Bowl party.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheese Platter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put away for Xmas gifts(yes I’m that person who likes to start early lol) They are very sturdy and the perfect size-and the price is very reasonable-very happy with my purchases! Super Fast Delivery!Highly recommend these cheese board and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: hon143

customer_reviews.title: this gift made me look good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for a charcuterie board for her b day and I found this thinking the price was too good to be true but I gave it a shot and it turned out to super sturdy and beautiful. Better than I was expecting for sure!!! This vendor definitely OVERDELIVERED. Her comment when she opened it "this is beautiful and much nicer than what I was asking for" I looked good, she was extremely pleased and now she is enjoying entertaining with it...great job!! Order this and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Hoglin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you’ll definitely feel good about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because someone I knew had one and I liked theirs a lot. I was really impressed with the personal note from the business owner when it arrived. Explaining the pride they take in their work and. Personally thanking me for my purchase. That was a very nice touch, that has been long forgotten. Also I was happy this was American made and some of the money from my purchase went to benefit cats. The quality and workmen ship are well worth every penny spent. This is definitely a product I will and have recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rocheny

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot smaller than I expected , if you want to use this board for just two people maybe 3 it will work , inised it for 4 people and had to constantly replenish everything because the board does not hold much - also was disappointed that the pictures knifes did not come with it
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Functional and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board is solid wood and the craftsmanship is excellent. The design is not only functional but it’s a beautiful Piece for entertaining. It’s a substantial size and weight. I’ve used this as a charcuterie board for entertaining and fruit and cheese snacks for a night in with the hubby. I love the molded grooves for extra space for crackers etc. It also includes a pull out drawer with utensils. Easy to clean and store. There’s a lot of these boards to choose from, I’m very happy I purchased this one. This is going to last a life time. Excellent quality. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Well made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a house warming gift and our friends are super happy. It looks classy, is sturdy, and holds a lot of food for a party. They love the cracker slots on the side - no extra board necessary. As a customer, this was delivered promptly and well packaged. I love that it was made in the USA. It feels good to support someone who wants to support his family. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Buchwurm

customer_reviews.title: Lovely board
customer_reviews.text: Used it for when all my friends came over and they loved it. I just wish it was a bit thinner or weight less. It is a little heavier on the side . Overall, its good quality and just the perfect size for a party of 2-4 people board.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Voong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! Bought this as a housewarming gift for some friends who love charcuterie along with some little cheese knives and they absolutely loved it. The wood is beautiful and so sturdy and it even has handle dips to more easily carry the board. The raised sides are a perfect place for the crackers and breads and the design in the middle is subtle yet adds such a beautiful finish. It's also very easy to clean and not expensive at all. Even came with a little paper measurement converter chart they loved too! Definitely recommend for a friend or yourself
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nasrah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day. We have used it so much since that time, as we do Keto and charcuterie boards are such an easy thing to throw together! The board is well-crafted and sturdy, and is very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: White Elephant Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a white elephant Christmas present. When I received it, I honestly thought about keeping it to myself cuz it looked so cute. I liked that it has a place to put the cracker rather than laying them where the cheese and grapes are, to keep them dry I mean. It was honestly a great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Hala

customer_reviews.title: Serving with class
customer_reviews.text: I like this tray a lot when entertaining. I’m a collector of beautiful serving wood trays to display meats, cheese and crackers and this one has a place for everything. This tray is easy to carry because of the handles on each side. Great item! A++
customer_reviews.author: Maria Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter for a wedding shower gift. She loves it! It's very nicely made and is perfect for those who like to put a little something out for guests to munch on. She and her fiancé are wine drinkers and have used this quite a bit to serve snacks when having friends over.
customer_reviews.author: marglane

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese/Charcuterie board is wonderful! It is very durable and looks amazing! Perfect for entertaining and I love the cheese utensils it comes with. This is not a cheap board and actually has some good weight to it. You cannot go wrong with this board and your guests will definitely compliment your presentation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Singleton

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing product and company!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cutting board as a house warming gift for my daughter and was amazed by the quality! She really loves it and uses it as a serving board as well because it's so versatile! I personally received a thank you letter for purchasing the cheese board from Alex Arno, the founder of this family owned business. Of all the products I've ordered from Amazon over the 22 years I've been a member, this is the first purchase that I received an thank you letter in the mail from the owner. I will keep this on the top of my list for future gifts! Thank you Royal Craft Wood!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cheese board for serving cheese, crackers, etc. I gave one as a gift and liked so much ordered one for myself. Holds just the right amount with indents to place your crackers. It is smooth, study and very easy to clean. Would purchase again to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: rw12690

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice quality product for the price. I will be using it to make a charcuterie board for Thanksgiving appetizers. It's the perfect size for what I need. Some reviewers mentioned misspellings, but all the words were spelled correctly on mine. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ransomed

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this cheese board! It’s just... I have been looking for a cheese board for a long time, and as soon as I saw this one, I knew it would be good. But it was better than good! Thanks for making such a quality product - I always wanted to make a cheese board presentation for my partner, and I was able to do so on this Valentines Day!
customer_reviews.author: C. David Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall, but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, BUT the drawer below is impossibly stuff and very difficult to open. The cheese cutters have to be stored separately because I don’t want to bother with the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: ShelllZzz

customer_reviews.title: Charcuterie
customer_reviews.text: This holds more than you think and the added drawer with cheese cutters adds a touch of class to this. I really love this board! This is great for when my in-laws stop in and I can set out nearly anything on it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Leah J

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted charcuterie board - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: The board came in a sturdy scratch-proof packaging. Looks and feels beautiful and sturdy. Has a nice weight to it, which makes it look super fancy with all the charcuterie items on it. Love the slots for crackers on it. I cracked it this weekend and it was such a nice conversation piece for my friends. It's a steal for the price and I'd highly recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: Bharat Mantha

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and well crafted!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cheeseboard. Had a dinner party in February and it was the hit of the party as well as the centerpiece! I love the side channels that hold nuts, olives or crackers. It's so well thought out. I hope you enjoy yours as much as I do mine!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy F. Deger

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage. Bad quality. Dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: I never even needed to take this out of the shrink wrap. The product clearly had nails sticking out on the food side of the board that could cut or scratch you. Not at all as pictured. Super poor quality. Dangerous product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anoneemuss

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to store ! The cheese accessories are so convenient enclosed in the board !
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the accessories are enclosed in the board ! Great size ! Easy to store , And to clean ! I was completely satisfied with this cheese board ! So , if you are considering buying a cheese board, you will Not be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: C E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workmanship and quality
customer_reviews.text: We like to have a nice cheese, fruit and wine dinner outside on our patio. None of our plates were really conducive to this. My wife ordered this cheese platter and we've been using it ever since. It is simple, elegant and of excellent craftsmanship. It is sustainable too, being crafted from bamboo. It washes easily and, unlike other wood cheese platters we have had, it has not lost it's durability nor worn after washing. If you are in the market for a cheese platter, you cannot go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Tarte

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board is so so so amazing! Super durable and just perfect for a cheese and wine night. I even received a letter from the owner, which was just a soft touch to this product. I totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, elegant, ergonomic, and easy to clean, all for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wanted to feel super fancy and get a cheese board, so I got him this one for his birthday. We’ve had it for about 3 months so far, and we’ve been satisfied every minute that we’ve used it! The board has cutouts for a steady grip while carrying it, and it has shallow grooves on the ends that we like to put an assortment of nuts on in addition to our crackers and cheese slices. It’s easy to wash, and I haven’t seen any warping. If I had to buy another cheese board, I’d buy this one again, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cerise

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice board. Good quality and is really nice looking when you set it out. Just be sure to season the board with mineral oil, this will make the board more attractive and will make it last for years. We have had several compliments from friends and family on the board. We will be purchasing a couple more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Warlock87

customer_reviews.title: Crack after 1 time use
customer_reviews.text: I was so prepared to give a 5 start review.... until I pulled it down to prepare for the holiday. It already has a crack, I purchased in October and have only used once. I’m very disappointed, needless to say.
customer_reviews.author: Denisha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality Affordable American made
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality well made bamboo tray at a fair price. Large enough to hold crackers, cheese, salamis and olives for a family gathering. Bamboo cleans well and does not hold odors. It’s also sustainable. If you are considering this product you won’t be disappointed with your purchase. And it’s American made.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell by the pictures but the grooves for the crackers is bumpy and rough- I'm guessing it's glue? ( the board does smell strongly of glue ) And the stamping is sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Cristionas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Item is the perfect size for me and my hubby. I love the material and how light and durable it is. Absolutely grateful for the email follow up from the seller with instructions on how to care for the board.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Mama

customer_reviews.title: Quality wood. Quality craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality on this wooden cheese board. It is a well built strong piece of wood that oozes quality at a great price. My family has enjoyed using this board almost every week since we have purchased it. The board is easy to keep clean and also arrived very timely even during this pandemic. If you are hesitant to buy this board, don’t hesitate and just buy it. It looks good and does its job very well. My husband and I also love the fact that it is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love Love !
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! I have used the board so many times when family and friends showed up. I always keep meat and cheese in case someone shows up. It’s always a hit. Love the sides to put crackers on. Great board !!!
customer_reviews.author: Rajnita Schell

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: A little Smaller than I would have liked. Had gathering for 6 and worked perfect but if keeping a bigger event this board will be too small but it looks great and I really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Charcuterie Board
customer_reviews.text: I love this bamboo cheese board! I wanted a nice one for a charcuterie board and it didn’t disappoint. It is a great size and quality. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: aperry

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second purchase of this product. I bought one as a birthday gift for a friend in May, and I loved it so much that I purchased one for myself! It's wonderful! It's sturdy, easy to clean, and it looks so elegant! I used it a gathering for friends, and they all raved about it! One of the best parts about this purchase is that it's American made! That was such a bonus for me. I just can't say enough good things about the product. Highly, HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Item
customer_reviews.text: I love my new charcuterie board. It is just the right size for several cheeses and meats. The side cracker slots keep everything together. The maker thought of everything by putting serving utensils in a handy drawer in the board itself. I bought a second board and gave it as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Suhadolnik

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, etching shoddily done, rough edges, no care instructions included. Unfortunately I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judi K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, bountiful serving  board!
customer_reviews.text: This was a house warming gift for my daughter. She LOVED It! Her10 year old stepdaughter loves to make fruit, cheese and meat boards before all of their cookouts It is durable and sturdy enough for a 10 year old, yet beautiful enough to use at an adult dinner. Easy to clean, easy to store and a beautiful serving piece!! I may have to get myself one😁
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product!
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo cheese board is fabulous! It is very well made, durable and beautiful. I bought another one as a gift because I was so pleased. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SCLB

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Item is not really sturdy and not washable the bamboo will split. I had a Wolfgang Puck cutting board made the same way and it was only good for 2 uses before it split. I’m returning it. I wanted a better quality board so I bought the Boos.
customer_reviews.author: TrueNorth

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Unlike a lot of wooden cutting/serving boards, once you wash them a couple of times they become rough and feel like they are going to give you splinters. I have rinsed and applied a light dish soap to this product about ten times now and it is like new. This is a fabulous item to add to your new kitchen especially at the price! On each side is like a little trough, so it holds crackers or pickled vegetables well. The owner sent me a handwritten thank you letter which was what sealed the deal that this product was not only great quality but so was the company that made it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheese bord
customer_reviews.text: Great product I was a little sad on the size of the product it I made it work. My cutting board is wider I wish this cheese board wasn’t so narrow. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: AMV

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cheese board for a bridal shower I was hosting. It is a great quality product. Very sturdy and I love the grooves on each side to hold crackers or little toasts. You can fit a lot of meat and cheese on this board and it is great for entertaining or just a Friday night in with family. Easy to clean and store. For the price this cheese board is amazing! Unrelated to the product but very helpful; it also came with a measuring guide for everyday cooking which I find really helpful because it's hanging on my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Board,  Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived quickly, and the packaging was excellent. I'm very happy with it overall, but I didn't expect it to be so small. Moving forward I'll check the actual dimensions instead of only looking at the presentation in pictures. I'm keeping it because it's well made, and beautiful on the table. But only really accommodates enough for about four people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for a new home owner!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, when I received it I thought about keeping it! But, it was a gift for a friend that purchased their first home, so I wrapped and sent it. They loved it, use it constantly, and say its one of their favorite kitchen items. Great quality and wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L. Vanden Boom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board is very pretty and the perfect size for entertaining. I bought it to take on vacation with us and I can’t wait to use it. It’s a great price for the board. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this board! It was so perfect as a house warming gift and my best friend was super excited to put it to use. Very sturdy, super easy to clean, and absolutely beautiful. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Shimer

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 of these as gifts both white elephant and friends and family. They were a big hit. I bought the cheese utensils separate but if the price range fit I would have bought the ones with the utensils included. The 3 white elephant ones were traded until they could not be traded any more. Good quality. Hand wash with mild soap is all that is needed. Funny enough I got a similar one as a gift from a friend so I'm happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted cheese board
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese board! It has great detail work and is perfect for what I need. I bought for myself but will be buying more to give as gifts this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make my cheese platters and Charcuterie Platters and so glad i did! The board is amazing quality and looks beautiful. It is sturdy and easy to wash. I love the little slide in compartment for the little knives. Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This board is a great quality, even more than anticipated. It is a great deal as the price is lower than many others but that definitely does not equate to lower quality. It is well crafted and solid and I love the features of the compartments on the side and the nice design in the center. They obviously take pride in their work and even followed up with a personalized thank you letter after purchase. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Nordyke

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Not too big, not too small. Bought 4 for our church events and they are awesome. We also got a slight discount via the seller for ordering more than one, so make sure you read the instructions for discount !
customer_reviews.author: Stacy and Emmet Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, my mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent quality and America made. Happy to support this veteran and his families business. My mom said it was the perfect size as she typically entertains in small groups. Everyone loved the food/presentation and there was just enough for everyone to snack/hang out.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Witzel

customer_reviews.title: Such a great cheeseboard!
customer_reviews.text: This cheeseboard is so different! It's nice and sturdy and absolutely would make a wonderful gift for anyone. I'd be psyched to get this - which is why I'm keeping it for me! This was well worth the money and came quickly and packaged well for shipping. Get this cheeseboard - you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cheeseboard! We bought to have just for us but plan to use for parties as well. We used it today and it was just beautiful It is sturdy, plenty of room and cleans easily. It is great quality and looks much more expensive than the price. It is a great bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Craftmanship!! Keep or Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a company gift exchange. It was such a classy gift and the person who received it was ecstatic. I loved it so much I contemplating getting on for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian W

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just graduated from college and I purchased this with cheeses, meats and fruit for her. She had a few college friends from her sorority over and they went through pictures and memories. This board has been used multiple times now and looks brand new. Easy to clean, great craftsmanship and great storage for the knives. I will definitely purchase one for my house and for future gifts. Just an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicol V

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cheese boards. They are sturdy and very well-made and very attractive. I bought one for me and one for a gift. I am so proud to be able to give one to my sister for Christmas. She is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan M

product_meta.title: Unique Bamboo Cheese Board, Charcuterie Platter & Serving Tray for Wine, Crackers, Brie and Meat. Large & Thick Wooden Server - Fancy House Warming Gift & Perfect Choice for Gourmets (Bamboo)
feature_bullets: BE AS CREATIVE AS YOU WANT. Unique design allows you to use it in as many ways as you can find: it can be a wine and cheese board, a charcuterie board, a fancy fruit and cheese platter, or a serving tray. The good news is it does not absorb the smell of food, so your muffins won’t taste like cheese.

MAKE IT LOOK BEAUTIFUL. This big square cheese board has additional spaces for crackers, nuts or bread. Place fruits, meat, pepperoni, brie or every kind of dessert inside. Side handles make it easy to serve your tasty piece of art!
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We are positive our clients like our cheese serving tray made with the premium quality and it will serve you for many years.
DURABLE, THICK AND GENTLE TO YOUR KNIVES. A smooth 100%-NATURAL bamboo surface will let you cut and slice cheese in rounds, wedges or blocks leaving your knives sharp.
SAFE AND NATURAL CHOICE FOR GOURMETS. Bamboo wood is known for its bacteria-resistant and antimicrobial properties. MAKES A PERFECT HOUSE WARMING GIFT!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,574 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
